website_summaries.verdict: With a design that’s similar to more expensive models, this ergonomic car seat cushion offers a more comfortable ride and relief from nagging back pain for a reasonable price. Affordable with no compromise on quality.
pros: Heat sensitive medical grade memory foam provides customized, form-fitting support
Wedge design improves posture and help to relieve spinal pressure without causing leg discomfort
Provides a bit of a boost without adding too much height
Coccyx cutout is easy on the tailbone
Features a non-slip bottom and removable cover
cons: May be too soft if you need firm support
Not everyone is a fan of the heat sensitive materials that become softer when warm and firmer when cold

customer_reviews.title: The BEST cushion- it has changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo above, I love this seat cushion so much that I put "Ask Me About My Butt Pillow" on my college graduation cap. (And people did ask about it!) What do I tell them? It's great for driving (most car seats slope downwards in the back, causing lower back pain!) seeing a play, sitting at a desk, etc! It lifts your pelvis higher than your thighs, which helps naturally align your back and provide comfort. I sit up straighter when I teach because I use it. All of my friends who have tried it want one of their own! I couldn't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Everlasting Comfort is true to it's name!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this Everlasting Comfort cushion in my Jeep Grand Cherokee. I love that it does not slide on my leather seats. It provides so much comfort and just the right additional height. I wish I had purchased this long, long ago. Discomfort in my lower back and legs is gone in the one hour drives I have been making. Looking forward to seeing how it does on some longer drives. I intend to purchase another to use in the house. I appreciate that the seller reached out immediately to be sure everything was acceptable in the service and product.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Lower back pane gone
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is very comfortable. I noticed that the lower back ache I had from sitting too much at the computer seems to have disappeared. I also tried this out in the car as the bucket seats made long drives (1 hour +) difficult. Would get out of the car and the lower back would hurt This cushion relieved that as well. Liked it so much that I just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: What a relief for tailbone pain!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Others I tried were too big to fit in my car (Subaru Impreza) and I like the soft cushiony feel. Plus, it is discreet enough to carry around if needed. I might get a second one for my office chair because it works great there, too. I am 5'7" and 140lbs and it is a good size/fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now pain free
customer_reviews.text: This wedge did what I hoped it would. Took pressure off of my leg at the knee, by elevating my back.
customer_reviews.author: SUZE47

customer_reviews.title: Reduces back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 66 years old with frequent back pain. Sitting in a car seat is challenging at times. This product greatly improves my driving experience by reducing my pain level.
customer_reviews.author: G. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, I drive for my job and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I drive for my job and this product really helps my back, very comfortable, it's made with memory foam so it never looses its form. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The way it positions you keeps your back at a nice curve, and keeps your legs slanting down so ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have lower back/hip pain, this pillow is meant for you! I use mine mainly in the car, and it helps so much with the long car rides. The way it positions you keeps your back at a nice curve, and keeps your legs slanting down so that your weight is more evenly distributed. I get "jump" out of the car now, instead of pulling myself out, shaking my legs to wake them up, etc... Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy R

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor advised me to use a wedge on the car seat. This product works for me....even on a 4 hour trip. I would suggest that you bring it in the house in the winter in cold climates. It gets a bit firm when cold.
customer_reviews.author: ms lin

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but needs to be just a bit longer to fit the car seat well.
customer_reviews.author: Goesyard

customer_reviews.title: So hard you can't even stand it
customer_reviews.text: I hate this. It is so damn hard that it is impossible to be comfortable. I loved the idea initially. and Lord knows I have tried to find this useful. I have now passed it around to 3 people in my family and all have said "Thank you but no thank you"
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted it to be. It gave me a little boost that I needed to see over the hood. Comfortable. Little firmer in the morning but I don’t mind, if you do, take it inside with you.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: I love this memory foam wedge
customer_reviews.text: I love this memory foam wedge ; I use it in my car and it gives great support!!! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lorene S. Nevels

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cushion
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cushion. I have buckets seats in my car and I am not very tall so this cushion help prop me up a bit in those deep bucket seat of mine. I love the comfort on long drive, and wedge style makes it that much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CFlo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This seat is extremely hard almost like a brick. I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I am 4'11" and weigh 105 pounds. This cushion, while a good size for me, was hard as a rock. I am surprised that some people found it too soft. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: MLF

customer_reviews.title: I put it in my car immediately and was pleasantly surprised how comfortable! Traffic was horrible that day and my new ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I put it in my car immediately and was pleasantly surprised how comfortable! Traffic was horrible that day and my new cushion made it tolerable! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband in his truck he didnt like it said it was uncomfortable and hurt his leg worse, I used it on my computer chair and agree it is not comfortable at all. My mom has one and doesnt like it either. This is a true review. Now the company is trying to pay me to remove my review,this is my opinion and I think all reviews should be seen so someone can make an informed decision and not only see good reviews. They should refund me because it was not a comfortable cushion to us not to remove a review. Good companies welcome all reviews. No product should only show good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love my 2014 Chevy Silverado partly because it is so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my 2014 Chevy Silverado partly because it is so comfortable. But I found when a take a trip of a couple of hours or more, my lower back really starts to ache, even with inflatable lumbar support. So I bought this product hoping to help this situation...WOW! what a difference! Last weekend we took a 9-hour driving trip (each way), and I had ZERO back problems. I have to admit I was not expecting much, but I was very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: I have physical issues and this is the best seat cushion ever
customer_reviews.text: Used for every day driving but also for an extended amount of time over 5 1/2 hour drive. I have physical issues and this is the best seat cushion ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stained my leather furniture
customer_reviews.text: The non-skid backing left stains on my leather sofa...waiting to see if the cleaner can remove the stains. Very unhappy with the damage caused by this product.
customer_reviews.author: DKM49

customer_reviews.title: Stained our car seats
customer_reviews.text: My wife would probably give it a five star review, but the cushion stained the leather on her brand new seats. The car had less than 500 miles on it, when she noticed the stains. You can see in the attached photo, the pattern of the bottom of the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I was having problems with pain in my legs and posterior when in my car. The car’s seat was slanted at such an angle toward the seat back that I couldn’t adjust the seat to a comfortable position without my head hitting the car’s roof. I can now keep the seat lower with the wedge in place to flatten my body angle in the seat. The leg and posterior pain is not a problem anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Rys

customer_reviews.title: I put this on the seat of my couch. ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the seat of my couch. It is helping relieve the pain I have in my lower back.Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this if you have a small butt
customer_reviews.text: This might work great for people with big bottoms, idk, but if you have small/medium hips it's rubbish. The gap in the back is really wide, so instead of your sitz bones resting on foam, they're on the uncomfortable edges of the gap. Also, the reviews said the foam doesn't smell, but it does. It's not the worst ever, but there's definitely a nasty chemical smell if you sniff the cushion and if you're sensitive to chemicals it might bother you.
customer_reviews.author: R2

customer_reviews.title: good quality, very comfortable foam wedge, doesnt slip or slide, angle noticeable, nice elevation and back support. easy clean.
customer_reviews.text: good quality, very comfortable foam wedge, doesnt slip or slide, angle noticeable, nice elevation and back support. easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Perspectech

customer_reviews.title: More discomforting
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but with my office chair it actually causes more pain and discomfort than without it. I think if you're larger in the backside this may not be a helpful product; but, it could also be how my office chair is positioned. I'm going to try it in my car and see if it works better there.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Cushion is not quite wide enough for an adult car seat. The hard nipples on the bottom rubbed off the dye on my 2017 Impala's cream colored leather.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Vonn III

customer_reviews.title: Love the chisel shape
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the chisel shape. It is perfect for the car, relieving pain while keeping legs positioned appropriately. He has lower back pain, sciatica, and groin pain. This cushion actually relieves some of his pain after sitting on it. Purchased for long car rides, which it is very helpful for. He now uses this cushion at the computer as well. Very comfortable and well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Brown

customer_reviews.title: Like most dense memory foam, it can feel much firmer than you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This was too hard for me. I was hoping it would absorb some of the road bumps so they wouldn't push up into my back, but the memory foam was too dense so it really didn't function that way. I took the memory foam out and went to my local foam store and found the perfect grade of foam that wouldn't squish down with my weight, yet maintained its energy absorbing qualities. I cut it to match the shape of the memory foam (a rough approximation, I admit) stuffed it into the cover, and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cello
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Cello lessons and they are 45 minutes long. After a while I begin to slouch and my back is soar. I brought this to my lesson last week and it worked great! It helped me keep my posture, was soft and no soarness at all. 7/25/19 Update: I have found this cushion to be useful for many things besides just playing cello. My couch slants in a bit, so I use this to sit upright. Although I usually use a regular bed pillow for meditation, I now use this cushion. It is more comfortable and really makes me sit upright throughout. Hope this helps :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a fit for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is and looked just like the pictures. My butt falls asleep within 10 minutes of sitting on it every time, I'm not sure why, maybe because the wedge is so hard? At this point I have taken out the insert and used the cover as a pattern, I've cut 2 layers of foam egg-crate and put that in the cover in it's place with a bit of pillow stuffing in the layers. So far it's working better. The wedge is well made- just not a fit for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Not good for car, perfect for office chair
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the car and it just did not work. It was too stiff and I was up too high in my little car. Had to continually adjust the mirrors on my 1 hr commute to work as it began to soften and sink in. Tried it on my office chair at work and it’s perfect! My back pain is no more during my 8 hours... really used to be in so much pain but this feels comfortable and supportive. I wouldn’t recommend it for the car but certainly would recommend it for your chair at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Danielle

customer_reviews.title: if your in a colder climate . Read first
customer_reviews.text: Redoing my review. If you live in colder climates, this is probably not the one you want unless you bring it in at night. I drive 45 minutes one way and this will pretty much remain a brick the entire drive. If it’s warmer, it’s actually pretty darn comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mule girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for long car drives!
customer_reviews.text: I had horrible sciatic nerve pain from driving in my bucket-seat Ford. Any trip over an hour was sure to inflame it. I got this for a 22 hour road trip and feel it really helped prevent pain my whole trip. It helped me sit up straight and had a cut out for where my spine ends. As an added bonus I am a short woman and can see the road/car hood better now. My 6’ husband bumps his head on the car roof if he sits on this seat, so beware if you are tall. I’m thinking of getting a second seat for my uncomfortable office chair so like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pad to take the pressure off my lower back in the car. This pad was hard as rock! Maybe mine was defective, but it was nothing like described by other multi star reviewers. I returned it. No problem returning and refund was quickly applied.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: It helped me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a driver, and I've been driving for the last a year and half. During that time I accumulated pain somewhere on my tailbone since I bought this pillow it really helped me a lot. The pain was gone. I am a short lady so I needed some elevation so I can see the road better. I know I can lift my seat higher but I won't be able to reach the pedals. So, with this car seat it helped me with that issue especially the design, it's wedge so I don't have to worry about my leg not reaching the pedal. I am glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P.

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way in converting my car's bucket seat into a flat seat.
customer_reviews.text: 1. It stays put when getting and out of the car. 2. It pretty much (but not totally) eliminates the bucket in my bucket seat. I am too big for the bucket so the really firm sides dig into my butt, causing leg pain that lasts long after I exit the vehicle. 3. The perfect solution would be to go back to the old fashioned bench seats, but I would be in the minority requesting such a feature. (Actually, the perfect solution would be for me to weigh less that 200 lbs. - but that has not been possible, either)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kool

customer_reviews.title: Very hard cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat for my daughter while she is in treatment for sciatica and numbness around her tailbone. I got the smaller version so it would fit in her car seat for use while driving. It is very firm! but I didn't realize it would be as hard as a brick. She could never get comfortable on it, so we will keep it and figure out another use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Piriformis Pain Syndrome Remains
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my discomfort during long distance driving. If I drive more than 10 minutes my pain starts to act Up under my seat bone. After trying the cushion in multiple cars, it was not comfortable nor helpful in either of them. The cushion actually added to the discomfort because it is smaller then the car seats and the edges put pressure on the hamstring. I really wanted to make it work so I tried it on my office chair and recliner with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: vk

customer_reviews.title: Unyielding and Not Designed for Bucket Seats
customer_reviews.text: This may be fine for the bench seat of an old pick-up, or the bench seats at a ballpark, but it doesn’t fit into a drivers seat at all. Not only is it Very rigid, it slides all over the place when you get in and out of the car. Also doesn’t’ have any give to it at all, even though I weigh 240 lbs. It raised me so high in my seat that my head almost brushed the roof, and I’m only 5’5”. I found a MUCH better option and tossed this baby into the trunk for emergencies, like if I need something to sit on to change a tire....or I need a really big door wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: good for bulging disc pain
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my spine and 2 bulging discs. Sitting is easily the most painful thing I do. I researched and very few cushions mentioned relief of disc pain, so I went with this item and hoped that it did the trick. So far I'm finding i can sit longer without damaging myself. I doubt it will alleviate the pain entirely, but this definitely makes sitting MUCH more bearable. This cushion is comfortable and seems to be a good quality product
customer_reviews.author: JL bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but hole too large for petite individuals
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is well made of very good quality materials. Unfortunately, it just isn't a fit for me. I am 5 feet tall, weigh 105 pounds and my hips are 35 inches. The hole is just too large to fit my body and causes my position on the cushion to be uncomfortable. The memory foam is a bit harder than that of other cushions I own. I do like the wedge design because it allows one to sit with appropriate knee position. I also like the lift it gave me in my vehicle as I was able to see much better. I'm sorry to return, but it just isn't a fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi94

customer_reviews.title: I appears to be very well made and the service was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the cushion but so far it has eliminated the pain I get in the back of my upper leg when I drive. I appears to be very well made and the service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for specific posture support
customer_reviews.text: Ask your PT if they advise you to sit higher and lean a bit more forward - then this is a great product. Works as expected to promote a forward- seated posture, enabling me to work at my desk longer than I could before. I had tried other foam wedges; some were too soft or too hard, some fell apart with repeated use. I had previously tried various pillows and wedges to provide lower back support, but that didn't help my particular issue. This product provided just the right amount of support AT A SLIGHT FORWARD ANGLE as my PT had advised.
customer_reviews.author: kmc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Especially for tall people!
customer_reviews.text: I've never heard of a "wedge" until taking a physical therapy class last week after injuring my back a year ago. I've purchased multiple lumbar seat supports in the past which almost made my back worse because there was still a ton of pressure going into my low back while sitting. This wedge actually takes pressure OFF my low back and spine while sitting due to the incline, to the point where you don't even need one of those lumbar support cushions at all. This wedge keeps my back very straight and is overall pretty comfortable. I've been sitting in it for long hours and my back feels way better already. I'm 6'1", 205lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I can see over the dashboard!
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to upgrade from an old throw pillow to an actual seat cushion to use as a "booster" when driving. Our car has really deep bucket seats and the instrument panel is placed really strangely, so I can't see a thing sitting in that driver's seat normally. This cushion is super comfortable and gives me enough of a boost to be able to see what I'm doing and drive more safely! Docking a star because it "sinks" when the car gets warm which reduces its effectiveness for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Shabnam

customer_reviews.title: Not great for tall people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use in the car to prevent his sciatica from acting up when he has to drive longer distances. It raises him up so high that it’s uncomfortable him to sit comfortably, even after lowering the driver’s seat as low as it can go. He’s 6’ tall. I wouldn’t recommend for anyone that height or taller. If you’re shorter than that, it might be great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Tapered toward the front
customer_reviews.text: I am using this support cushion to alleviate nerve pain in my left leg, after my orthopedic surgeon sent me for PT. My PT person came to the conclusion, the problem is with a nerve coming from the spine. So, I was searching for a cushion that would not put any pressure at the bottom of my spine and minimal pressure along my thigh. This cushion has a. notched back and tapers toward the front. It did just what I expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Practical Relief
customer_reviews.text: Even after buying a new chair to help relieve my sciatica pain, I finally realized I needed more cushion and support. The Everlasting Comfort cushion is just right for long sessions at the computer and the convenient handle makes it easily transferable for use in my car. The memory foam molds to your form and provides custom support where needed.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Good for extra height
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the cushion once in my vehicle for a very short distance. It gives me the extra height I need. I can’t comment on the comfort delivered over a long road trip. That needs to be determined. Update...this wedge cushion is very comfortable. It pushes me up just enough to feel the lumbar seat area doing it’s job. I’ve added a star to my review⭐️ Another update: my husband used the cushion while driving a 250 road trip. It definitely increased his comfort level as he has hip issues. I just ordered a second for me to use in the passenger seat. It’s a good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Really "saved my butt" on recent trips
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this cushion made it possible for me to endure three trips (each was 7 hours one-way) over the past two months, shortly after I severely strained my "gluteous maximus." (In case you're not familiar with that particular injury, it's a literal "pain in the butt.") Sitting immobilized, as on an airplane, for hours is excruciating. Without this cushion, I would have been screaming in pain. The handy little handle -- stitched on tightly at one end -- made it possible to maneuver through crowded airports and while boarding by using a carabiner to snap cushion onto my purse strap.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H. Stell

customer_reviews.title: It's firm enough for support
customer_reviews.text: For me it's comfortable. Most of the similar stuff/cushion I used before, I found them too soft and went out of shape very quickly. This one feels right on, if anything, I would actually hope it's harder. I weight about 180Lb. Because of the work from home, I didn't really have a pricy office chair at home for the back support, so I have been getting a lot of pain from my back, especially tailbone. This cushion helps a lot. I actually have no more pain from tailbone since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good cushion for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any pain I was trying to alleviate, I needed something to act as a “booster seat” at work. My desk is higher than the chair can go. I wanted to sit higher, comfortably. This cushion does that reasonably well. I like the wedge shape that tips me slightly forward (my chair can’t adjust in that direction). I thought it would be big enough, and it barely is. but wish it was a few inches wider and deeper. It’s pretty comfortable even if a teensy bit small.
customer_reviews.author: marshall hyde

customer_reviews.title: Life saving cushion for long car trips!
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is very supportive, not too soft and not too hard. It has a cutout in back to take pressure off your tailbone. The cover is easily removed for washing. There is no odor from the cushion. I sat on it for 1500 miles and it was a lifesaver! It made sitting totally bearable. I am 5’3 and it worked great on the car seat. It even made it easier to see over the dash! I tried it on a kitchen chair before our trip, and the front was too thick, cutting off circulation to my legs. But, no problems in the car. I highly recommend this cushion for your car.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Prairie Chick

customer_reviews.title: Rising to new heights
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. I don’t want to be the white-haired lady looking under the top of the steering wheel and driving down the street. Your wedge pillow gives me a bit more height behind the wheel and good support for my back and neck. I like the fabrics and 2-side option.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Life-saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a herniated disc that turned into an extrusion that is lodged against my L5 nerve root. I have to be seated at a 90 degree angle to avoid pain shooting down my leg. Most chairs nowadays -- including the seat in my car -- are angled backwards. This cushion is perfect for correcting that angle. It's very soft and comfortable to boot. I bought one for home, one for my car, and one for work. I don't know what I'd do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nairi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Angle and Perfect Firmness
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my hard swivel chair. I also don't like how chairs angle back for the thigh to sink back into the back of the chair. I prefer a more active posture, so this cushion is perfect to counter balance that angle and give me a slight forward angle so I don't sink back. Another important factor is this cushion is not too soft, it's firm that the body weight does not render the padding useless. It's firm but forgiving. It's a comfortable cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great for annoying tailbone injuries.
customer_reviews.text: It was well worth it for the money. I have recurring tailbone flare ups due to a fracture several years ago. It flares up when I am forced to sit for long periods of time. After a recent femur fracture, that was the case. It flared up for over a month, and this cushion was very helpful, especially when riding in a car. Works well on some household furniture, unless your sitting in a very cushioned chair or sofa. It can be helpful with those, however they can sometimes be too soft, and interfere with the the cushions effectiveness. Over all I was happy to have it here, especially considering how long this last flare up stayed.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: My Second One!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my office chair, as I was virtually schooling my grandson due to the pandemic. What a help! I have had sciatica issues and had injections years back for it. The office chair was starting to flare me up again. I purchased this in hopes of relief and yes it did!! I then let my husband use it for traveling in the RV and he said he wanted to keep it and I should buy a second one. So, that’s exactly what I did! Great product and I can sit in my chair without issues.
customer_reviews.author: LoRon

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion
customer_reviews.text: My Wife got this for me to use while snow plowing, sometimes Im in the truck for hours and hours straight and my "butt bones" started to really get uncomfortable even in a new truck. Within 30 minutes of using it, it warmed up and molded to me and absolutely zero butt bone pain! Ive used it 2 or 3 times now for hours and zero pain! The only thing is it will sit you up about 2" which for me took some getting used to while plowing. I'll probably end up shaving some off and tapering it more but well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2TyKy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cushion for my car!
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe tailbone condition and was desperate for something to help when I am driving! Other cushions just don't sit right in my car seat. This cushion works great and best in the car. It provides just the right amount of support in my car seat. I tried it indoors at the computer, sewing machine, recliner, and it is good but smashes down just a little more than I like, but I am overweight, so I suspect it will be great once I finish losing this weight! Very well made! Does not make me sit too high either. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BGuhl

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptably cheap quality, poor support
customer_reviews.text: The Everlasting Comfort Wedge Cushion is poorly constructed and was a complete waste of money. I am average weight and height. I only used this cushion a total of 7 times while I drove to my physical therapy appointments. During that short period of time, the cushion has completely lost its shape and provides unevenly distributed support. This causes me to experience even more back pain. The level of quality is unacceptable. I would not recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JennyWren

customer_reviews.title: NOT for lightweighted individuals, hard as rock!
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a rock, created pain! Definitely not designed for lightweights. I weigh 117 lbs. As instructed, I sat on the cushion for extended periods of time (30+ minutes) to allow my body heat to soften it. To no avail. I tried several times over the course of a month, the cushion never gave. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, but not everlasting
customer_reviews.text: Man, this thing is comfortable. But unfortunately, the memory foam does what it's supposed to, I guess, and it memorizes your backside. After about 6 weeks, my massive 150 pound frame has compressed the cushion to where it doesn't do much. It looks like new but it's very soft. Despite the fact that these don't last, they're so comforatble when new that I'd consider getting an Amazon subscription if they would send a new one every 60 days. I'm serious.
customer_reviews.author: Coronet BlueTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This company goes an extra mile
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product because I was having pain in my hip while driving. I tried it for a week or so with not much improvement. I spoke with someone and they decided not to charge me because it did not make the difference I had hoped for.Well lo and behold I kept using the product because I liked the additional height it gave me while driving. One day I realized that I also was no longer experiencing the pain. So please feel free to bill me as your product does indeed work it just needed a little more time.
customer_reviews.author: teri gordon

customer_reviews.title: Wedge cushion helps alleviate lower back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few of these wedge cushions to support my lower back. I am a small person, and most chairs, couches and car/truck seats are too deep and too soft for me. I sit on one and put one behind me to make it so my back is supported and pain free. It's made well and easy to clean. My only complaint is that if you keep it in your vehicle in cold weather, the seat becomes as hard as rock. So I cannot leave it in my car winter time.
customer_reviews.author: J. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: The quality and comfort are unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I was rather surprised with this as other memory foam products I have purchased that are similar to this one have been horrible disappointments. This one is great! The quality, build, and comfort are great. Being disabled with a bad back it is very difficult to find products that work for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: woohair

customer_reviews.title: May Feel Better Backwards
customer_reviews.text: I’d bought this to put in my desk chair since working long hours from home now due to the pandemic. However, my bottom and tail bone ached more after initially using this product. I turned it around backwards to give it another try and voila, it’s working better for me backwards.
customer_reviews.author: TinaMac

customer_reviews.title: Not quite it...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this cushion based on all the 5 star reviews but after receiving mine, I am confused. My intent was to use this in my car. Fits nice in the driver seat of my Nissan. But my only thing is... it is so stiff. This is not memory foam. I don’t find this comfortable at all. It’s much thicker and not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: No hip pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a road trip from central Oregon to Salt Lake City and then Springdale, Utah. I drive a Prius Prime plug-in that destroys my hips in the passenger seat. At first I I didn't think this was going to work because it's so much shorter than my car seat, but I put the small end of the cushion at the very front of my car seat with a small pillow to fill in the space at the back. This left the hole for the coccyx free. Voila! No hip pain on the entire trip. Thank you Everlasting Comfort 100% Pure Memory Foam Wedge Seat Cushion!
customer_reviews.author: kpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the timeframe statef by Amazon. This cushion is very comfortable and light weight. It stays put in the seat thanks to the texturing on the back of it. This is used foe my mother at home. This allows her to sit in out dining room chairs fr extended amounts of time. I've tried many other chair cushions but this one seems to work the best for her. I plan 9n purchasing a couple more because they're inexpensive but comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Purnell Askew SR

customer_reviews.title: How did I drive without this???
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1" and have a great deal of difficulty seeing over the steering wheel and looking at the side views from the door windows. I ordered this cushion after reading the reviews and wish I had done so years earlier. I am a more confident driver now that I can "see " everything I need to see. It is extremely comfortable and allows me to really enjoy driving my Honda Civic.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil G.

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is great but that hole at the back of the pillow is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is great but that hole at the back of the pillow is terrible. Pros: Soft Nice material Easy to wipe clean Cons: At the back of the pillow there is a large hole (I think it is for folks with problems other than their posture and lower back) it makes the pillow VERY uncomfortable to sit on for long periods of time as it creates unnecessary pressure in that area. I can no longer return this but I will be buying a different pillow without any dents or holes.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Started having tailbone issues during a long road trip of some 4,000plus miles. Had it delivered to one of our stops and it was a lifesaver! It immediately relieved the pressure and the agony of sitting for hours on end. We now use it in the car all the time. The wedge design is a nice feature. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Clare

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to pain in my tailbone. The seat was way too hard and gave me more pain and irritation instead of providing relief or comfort. Also, the customer service was terrible because they did not follow through on promises.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Helped with height adjustment in driver’s seat.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t buy this for pain, I purchased it to boost my height behind the wheel of my car without crushing my legs into the steering wheel. It helps, but could use another inch. It’s not very comfortable though. Very stiff. I can see better over my dashboard though, and my sun visor is actually effective now. (Someone needs to alert Toyota to the fact that many female drivers are not only short, but have short torsos and make their seats more adjustable for height!)
customer_reviews.author: suzgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Tapered pad extremely helpful
customer_reviews.text: My short wife has always had trouble seeing over the steering wheel while driving. Using other pads to lift her up made it difficult for her short legs to reach the foot pedals. This tapered pad is not only very comfortable, but raises her enough to easily see over the steering wheel while still allowing her to easily reach the foot pedals. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Roval

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be without it!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently strained my lower lumbar and could only sit for about 10 mins. I was skeptical but it worked. It was comfortable to sit. I still had some pain just because I strained the muscle so bad. I no longer have pain but have to wait a month or two for the muscle to heal and I’m still using this. It’s so comfortable. It really helps. I love it and can’t be without when I sit on my office chair. Make sure that you put it correctly on the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Foam compresses down to nothing when sitting on it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a heavy person (165lbs), but when I sat on the cushion, it compressed down so much that I could feel the hard chair underneath. Needs to be either firmer foam, or more of it. Either way, it's useless and back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Ted M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a short time, however between taking online classes and being an avid gamer much of my time is spent on a chair behind a desk. This product allows me to sit for the hours needed and has eased nearly all back pain associated with sitting for so long. My lower back (idk technical terms) around the tailbone would get very sore but this seems to have solved that problem. I'm considering getting one for my car as well but I DO recommend to anyone that has to sit for extended periods of time and especially if you have back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: ITS NOT ALL ITS WORKED UP TO BE
customer_reviews.text: I DISLIKE HOW EASY IT IS TO FLATTEN IT. I WEAR A SIZE 10 AND ITS ALREADY SMASHED FLAT. I HAVE ONE ON MY COMPUTER CHAIR THAT IS MUCH BETTER THAN THIS ONE. I SEE WHERE IT LEAVES MARKS ON YOUR CAR SEAT. I AM GOING OUT AND TAKE IT OFF OF MY SEAT RIGHT NOW.
customer_reviews.author: J. hyden

customer_reviews.title: Good for piriformis symptoms / sciatic nerve pain
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with a piriformis injury for several months and sitting in some chairs and especially cars is painful. Of the items/options I've tried, this is the only one that has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Tim_B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We acquired another car and seems to sit lower than the one we had. I felt like I was sitting in a hole. To top that off, I suffer from some sciatic nerve issues. So I purchased this cushion to lift me up a bit and to see if it would stop the sciatic pain I was experiencing. Wonder of wonders! I no longer feel like I am sitting in a hole and have little to no pain when I drive. I have only traveled about 30 minutes at a time so far, but I am looking forward to seeing how the cushion does when we take a two to three hour road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie @ 45

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help with long car rides.
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back pain from an idiot who ran a red light and broadsided me. I was hoping this would make long car drives more bearable, but it didn't. I really could not stand to sit on it for more than 10 min in the car. It actually made my back hurt worse in the car. I was going to return it but I use it just to sit on my chair at home and it's good for that. Makes sitting in the chair less painful.
customer_reviews.author: Angelofmrcy

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how much I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so comfortable! I ordered a flatter pillow from another large retailer several months ago and needed another for our 2nd car. I couldn't remember where I ordered it, so I ended it ordering this one from Amazon. It is perfect for me! I am only 5', so it gives me a little height to see over the steering wheel better and did I say how comfortable it is? I ended up sticking the first pillow I bought in a closet and purchasing another one of these so I have one in each of our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Roth

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Probably great for most people.
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product. I am using it in my car, and the fit may depend on your make/model. I was having hip pain due to a muscle pull, so I can't expect the product to necessarily fix that, but it helps. I found I have to close up the rear center gap a bit to get the balance I need. The cushion feel and support seem to get better over time. I would definitely recommend others try it.
customer_reviews.author: The Besty

customer_reviews.title: Good accessory for WFH
customer_reviews.text: My dining table is doubling as a desk these days and my dining chairs aren’t the most comfortable for 8+ hour work days. I needed a cushion and found this one with favorable reviews. Do yourself a favor and check out the warehouse deals for discounts on your items before paying full price. I was able to snag this at half the price! There was a little damage to the outside box but the item was new! Score!
customer_reviews.author: Trina D.

customer_reviews.title: Alleviates hip pain during long commute
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having hip and knee pain after driving to and from his office. I got this wedge cushion for his car seat, since the car seat only adjusts back and forth and not up and down. His symptoms sounded like sciatica and I thought that if his hips were higher than his knees during the commute, it would help. I'm happy to report that it has alleviated his hip pain already. I'm hoping this cushion will give us a few more years with his car.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Bought this on site, Did not even read the reveiws..
customer_reviews.text: i sit ALOT, It is summer my back hurts,hemoroids acting up, my legs are tingling and my feet feel they are on fire and need too have ice packs on them even during sleep. Within 48 hours all that changed no ice at all. little tingling, 80% gone and going. i LOVE the wedge and no gel too break and goo out. Do NOT look anywhere else. By the way im 200 lbs and have this in a roker recliner.. i would recomend it anywhere you sit..Sit on it correctly and it works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Alice F. Meier

customer_reviews.title: I would try another product
customer_reviews.text: It is a little too small and I do not like that the zipper is on the bottom. Eventually I believe this will wear a spot on my leather seats. It kind of works as a cushion and I had hopes for it, but overall I wouldn't buy again and don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Markh

customer_reviews.title: 💩🚽🏃👎
customer_reviews.text: Activated by heat basically means that once the wedge reaches body temperature, it loses its form and becomes a pointless distraction while driving. Btw, this review is from a 165lb man with a medium frame.
customer_reviews.author: Hing of the Kill

customer_reviews.title: DROVE 45 HOURS WITH THIS!!! SAVED MY BACK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I drove from the East Coast to Colorado and back, and I usually get very bad back pains and glute pains. This seat cushion saved me! The higher angle allows your pelvis to sit tilted instead of back and down against the seat which helps your glutei muscles, and I was able to shift it into different positions easily. I have tried several seat cushions but they didn't help. This was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion
customer_reviews.text: My husband had foot surgery and has to spend a lot of time with his foot elevated. That means a lot of sitting. Tried another cushion, but it wasn't very comfortable as it put too much pressure under his thighs. The wedge shape of this one did the trick. It supports his rear, relieves the pressure from his tailbone, and the front being sloped down in the front means it doesn't cut into the back of his thighs. Thank you for a great cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Sewfine

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a second one
customer_reviews.text: After using the first cushion for a week, knew I had to have two, one for our vehicle and one for home where I sit in front of the computer. I would recommend to anyone who has to sit for hours, which is most of us these days. Have yet to wash the cover, but looks like you just remove the cushion and wash the cover. Anticipating hours of comfort to the back and butt muscles.
customer_reviews.author: RatingtoHelp

customer_reviews.title: So far,so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I ordered this cushion because I am having pain when sitting in the non ergonomic chairs I have at home while working at home during the pandemic. There is a noticeable improvement in my discomfort. I hope that will continue!
customer_reviews.author: jak

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but not too firm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wedge for car because I get hip pain when I drive too long. It is very comfortable, but I was expecting it to be firmer than it actually is. The angle of the wedge is not very high, so I wouldn't say my pain is gone, but it definitely helps relief some pain during long car trips. I ended up propping a rolled up towel underneath mine, so it would be a little higher and more supportive. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who needs a bit more support.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: lifts me 'onto' the seat
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a week, but so far so good. It folds to fit into a bag, it is very slim. I bought it because the angled sides of the bucket seats in my corrolla are pressing on the sides of my hips. This raises me up and eliminates the problem. Note that it will raise you up. I'm 5'10, and this puts my head near the ceiling, but its worth it for the savings on the hip pain. Much less hip pain getting out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 teens

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. I bought it to use exclusively at the kitchen/dinner table. I'm a very short, skinny person with no padding whatsoever on my behind This pillow solves my problems with tail bone and hip bone pain while sitting on ordinary kitchen chairs. And the wedge shape lets my feet reach the floor whereas they couldn't with other similar pillows. The memory foam is firm, but not rock hard like in some other pillows. This pillow might not work as well for someone considerably bigger and heavier than I am, but I'm very pleased with how it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the pressure bucket seats put on the backs of my thighs. For my car, I purchased this seat cushion and I love it. It does change my sitting posture to more upright😊, and site my butt just high enough that my thighs are not pressured. May consider @nother one for other places and chairs...
customer_reviews.author: adzukibean

product_meta.title: Everlasting Comfort Car Seat Cushion - Truck Seat Cushion - Wedge Cushion - Body Heat Responsive - Orthopedic U Cut-Out Design to Relieve Pain
feature_bullets: CAR SEAT CUSHIONS FOR AUTOMOBILES - Our wedge cushion relieves pain while driving or sitting for long periods. It improves posture and increases comfort without putting pressure on your thighs like conventional seat cushions. Our driver seat cushion features a U-shaped cut out in the rear to suspend the tailbone and coccyx for added relief. Can also help relieve sciatic nerve pain (sciatica).

100 PERCENT MEMORY FOAM CAR CUSHIONS FOR DRIVING OR OFFICE CHAIRS - The memory foam absorbs pressure yet keeps its shape to support your tailbone, coccyx, lower back, lumbar, spine, hips, and legs from those severe pressure points.
HEAT RESPONSIVE TECHNOLOGY - Our advanced memory foam adapts to body heat to mold perfectly to the shape of your bottom.

NONSLIP RUBBER BOTTOM - Will stay in place in the car, airplane, stadium seat or wherever your trusty cushion may travel. No more struggles with readjusting the cushion every time you sit down. The wedge pad is also portable due to its convenient sewn-in handle.

LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE - We provide the best customer experience possible. If anything goes wrong with your seat cushion, we've got your back, or shall we say...butt. CAUTION: Non-slip rubber bottom may stain light colored leather/vinyl. Before use, wash cover in soap and hot water. Once the cover is dry, test for color fastness with a towel and hot water.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,606 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
